name: Capture The Flag (itch) (MalosoCreations)
description:
Introduction

This is a simple game of Capture the Flag created for an artificial intelligence (AI) paper made using Unity. It makes use of a finite state machine to control the AI along with steering behaviors. There are unfortunately a few instances where the AI does behave weirdly.

Game

In this game, you play as a member of team Blue, facing off against team Red, in a game of Capture the Flag.

Attempt to capture the enemy flags and return them to your base without being caught, while also defending against enemy attempts to do the same. If a friendly unit has been captured, they can be tagged and freed either by yourself, or a friendly unit (only one unit saved at a time).

Win by either capturing all enemy flags or tagging and sending enemies to prison.

Mix the game up by increasing the number of agents in the game for each team (chosen from the start menu).

Controls

A - Move left

D - Move right

W - Move up

S - Move down

Spacebar - Swap to next available unit (unit not in prison)

ESC - Exit current game and return to Main Menu

Credits

All music and sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
